item.title: Export DB table records in excel laravel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Export DB table records in excel laravel appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is Ranjit, In this article, we can see about how to export a table from the database into excel using laravel.

Project creation in laravel

  • First, you must create Laravel project on your machine. Laravel can install through composer using this command.

       composer create-project –prefer-dist laravel/laravel <project_name>

    It will take up to 5-10 mins depends on your machine configuration and it will install the latest version of Laravel.

  • Can run your application by this command

       php artisan serve

Installing Excel Export plugin in laravel

  • We can install maatwebsite laravel package for easy export excel

      composer require maatwebsite/excel

  • After installation over, add the below code into your config/app.php file in provider’s array 
         'providers' => [
      ...
      Maatwebsite\Excel\ExcelServiceProvider::class,
     ],

The post Export DB table records in excel laravel appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: 10 Quick Tips for Hybrid Mobile App Developers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post 10 Quick Tips for Hybrid Mobile App Developers appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Though Hybrid Mobile App development considered underrated, There are still many Hybrid Mobile apps are being developed. Being Hybrid Mobile App Developers, we love Hybrid Mobile App Development. There are many popular apps like Amazon, Uber, Evernote, Facebook etc., The frameworks used to develop Hybrid apps makes Hybrid Mobile app developers easy to make it. To develop a successful mobile app, Hybrid Mobile app developers should follow some secret methods. Though there are many frameworks available to develop Hybrid Mobile apps like Ionic Framework, There are some tips for Hybrid Mobile App developers to follow.

 

Choose the Right Framework

 

  • When going with Hybrid Mobile app development, Choosing the right framework to develop is very important. There are many frameworks available. Some of them are Ionic Framework, React Native, Xamarin, PhoneGap etc., The very confusion moment is choosing between Ionic Framework or React Native. Ionic Framework is on Angular 4 and React Native is on React js. Since both are booming in the market, It’s hard to choose the right one.
  • Anyways, The purpose of developing the Hybrid Mobile App can define it. If you are looking to develop both Web and Mobile app, Then our suggestion is to go with Ionic Framework. Since it is on Angular JS which can be used in both Web and Mobile App, Number of resources to be used can be reduced.

 

We Love Hybrid Mobile App Development

 

  • There is a licensing Problem with React Native. It license says They can make it to full premium version anytime. So before choosing React Native, Make sure you can able to overcome the license problem.
  • If you are a .NET / C# Developer, Then the only option is Xamarin. Xamarin is a Microsoft product which uses C# as a base language to develop Hybrid Mobile app. Of course, You need Visual Studio tools to complete the development.

 

Ionic Framework – Lazy Loading Issue

 

  • If you are using Ionic Framework, Then you might be facing Lazy Loading issue in the new version. Still, Ionic Framework is working on it to overcome, There are some ways to fix the issue on our own. Instead of declaring all the Nodule Modules in the Main and pages where the node modules to be implemented. Declare the Node modules only in the pages. As the number of Node Modules increases on the Main page, The Lazy Loading time increases.
  • It is better to avoid unwanted node modules on the main page.

 

Don’t go with Hybrid Mobile App Development

 

Choosing the right Plugins

 

  • When we come to Hybrid Mobile App development, Definitely it is going to be on both Android and iOS and sometimes in Windows. While deploying the app to different platforms Plugins may get conflict. Some plugins may support only in Android and not on iOS.
  • Before choosing a plugin to implement the native function in Mobile App, Make sure it supports in all the platforms.

 

Checklist for Hybrid Mobile App Developers

 

  • Before choosing Hybrid App, Make sure the requirement can be done in Hybrid. If there are more native functions or if the app is very complex, It is suggested to go with Native. But still, if you want to go with Hybrid, Then make sure the app is being developed with proper performance check.
  • Inspect the App in chrome browser and check for Network and console logs. Try creating the apps without any error in console logs. As the error increases, It may affect the performance.

 

Hybrid Mobile App Development 

 

  • Make proper performance check in the browser and Mobile App testing before deploying in Play store or App store.
  • If the mobile app is targeted for lower versions of Android or iOS, Then Hybrid App is not the right choice. Hybrid Apps are meant for Android Lollipop versions and above and iOS 10. Though it supports from Jellybean, It is suggested to with Lollipop target.

If you are still looking for any support to know more about Hybrid Mobile app development, Reach our Free consultation team for more details.

Feel free to share your reviews over comments.

 

The post 10 Quick Tips for Hybrid Mobile App Developers appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Why We Love Hybrid Mobile App Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Why We Love Hybrid Mobile App Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
We have been talking Hybrid Mobile App development in many articles. You might be wondering what’s in Hybrid Mobile App Development and what makes Hasoians to write more articles on it. Hybrid technologies and it’s supportive on different platforms makes best.  Sorry, Not different platforms, It’s on all the platforms.

Hybrid Application development always reduces the development time and cost which made many of our clients beneficiary. And recent updates of Hybrid Application development makes deployment on Web and as Desktop Applications too.

What can a Hybrid Mobile App do?

The same thing as explained in other articles before. With Hybrid Mobile App development we can able to deploy on different platforms. Oh, wait, not only on web platforms, Now we can able to deploy it as Desktop Application and Web Application.

Secrets of the Successful Hybrid Mobile Apps

Progressive Web Apps are the next generation of web applications. Since the usage of mobile phones has been increased drastically. All the web applications are being developed with complete mobile optimized. But making the UI (User Interface) alone as mobile-optimized is not enough. There are lots of things to be considered for making a Mobile Optimized Web applications and that comes with Progressive Web Apps.

So what? Can a Hybrid Mobile App development help to make a Progressive Web Apps?

Yes of course, why not? Hybrid apps are web nature.

Hybrid Mobile App as Desktop App?

And again the same answer, Why not? There are many Hybrid Desktop existing but the beauty part is. When you can deploy the code that you made for mobile application as a Desktop application. Hybrid Mobile App development can make it.

What can we deploy with Hybrid Mobile App Development?

Here we go with a list of applications what we can deploy with Hybrid Mobile App Development.

Double Your Profit With Mobile App for Blog

  • Android Mobile and Tablet Applications
  • iOS Mobile and iPad Applications
  • Windows Mobile Applications
  • Windows Desktop Applications
  • Progressive Web Applications
  • Universal Windows Applications

Does Hybrid Mobile App Development support Native Mobile Functions?

One of the reasons why some hesitate to go with Hybrid Mobile App development is, worrying about native functions. Like NativeMobile Application Development uses libraries to access native functions like camera, Bluetooth, NFC, Fingerprint etc.,  Hybrid Mobile App development is with many plugins which help to access all the native functions.

So, No worries about using Native functions in Hybrid Apps.

What about Hybrid Mobile App Performance?

Another main reason, Why some developers hesitate to use Hybrid platforms. When we compare the performance of Native Mobile Application and Hybrid Mobile Application, Always native performance is great. But it doesn’t mean that Hybrid Mobile app performance is very low. There might be some milliseconds lags between a Native and Hybrid Mobile applications. But is it possible to develop a Good standard application?  Experienced Hybrid Mobile app developer can make it.

Don’t go with Hybrid Mobile App Development

There are many tech giants using Hybrid platforms to develop mobile applications. Like Instagram, Facebook, Evernote, Twitter etc., At the end, Don’t hesitate to use Hybrid Mobile App development platforms. Make a small research on your own and get to know more about it.

Stop wasting your time, Check this out 

Feel free to share your view on Hybrid Mobile App Development and we are happy to respond to your comments.

The post Why We Love Hybrid Mobile App Development appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Why Is Hybrid Mobile App Development Considered Underrated
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Why Is Hybrid Mobile App Development Considered Underrated appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
The scope of Mobile App Development has been increasing day by day. There are Billions of Applications in Google Play store and Millions of application in App store. And many of them are in Hybrid Mobile App Development Platforms. The main reason for such amount of application in Google Play store and App store is the simplicity of Application development. Developing application has become easier one and also everyone started expressing their ideas through mobile apps. There are many technologies available to develop a mobile application. and certain drag and drop tools helps to develop a mobile application without a single line of code. 

Get to know more about Hybrid Mobile Application Development

Though there are many technologies available to develop a mobile application. Hybrid Mobile Application Development is one of the trending development platforms. With Native Mobile Application Development. One can able to develop a mobile app for one platform either on Android or iOS. But With Hybrid Mobile Application Development. It has made easy to develop the application and deploy it on different platforms with a single code. 

What is Hybrid Mobile App Development

If you can able to deploy an application on multiple platforms like Android, iOS, Windows etc., with a single code. For Example, If we are about to develop Magento E-commerce Mobile Application in Android iOS, Then probably Hybrid Mobile Application might be the right choice.  With this we can able to deploy the application on both Android and iOS. Whereas if we choose to go with Native Mobile Application development. Then both Android and iOS have to be developed separately. And also the cost and time of developing Native Mobile application would be high. 

What’s crazy on Mobile App Development

Why Hybrid Mobile App Development is underrated!!

And here we come to core concept of the article. Why Is Hybrid Mobile App Development Considered Underrated?

The main reason is the Frameworks. Ther are many frameworks available to develop Hybrid Mobile applications like Ionic Framework, React Native, Xamarin, Titanium, and the mother of all frameworks, PhoneGap. Though there are many frameworks, All the frameworks are not good as to develop a standard application. There is licensing problem on using React Native since Facebook has said that, they will start charging for it anytime. Intel HTML5 fails to provide proper native functions and No updates with PhoneGap. 

These issues made Hybrid Mobile App Development Considered Underrated. But still, there are some good frameworks like Ionic Framework, which provides regular updates and many trusted companies are using it. There are many certain ways to follow to develop a standard Hybrid Mobile Application. 

You may check about Ionic Mobile App Developer

If you are looking for any support on Hybrid Mobile App Development, Feel free to reach our consulting team or comment below. 

The post Why Is Hybrid Mobile App Development Considered Underrated appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Secrets of the Successful Hybrid Mobile Apps
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Secrets of the Successful Hybrid Mobile Apps appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Mobile apps are one of the best ways for making money. But not all the business apps or Hybrid Mobile apps are successful. If you are looking to develop a successful mobile app, that too in the Hybrid platform.  Then you must know these secrets of the successful Hybrid Mobile Apps. We have gone through several Hybrid Mobile apps that are running successfully. And we came up with some secrets that actually made those apps successful.

Choosing the Right Platform

When it comes to Hybrid Mobile App Development, choosing the right framework is the most important one. There are many frameworks available and PhoneGap is the mother of all. However, PhoneGap has become outdated one and there are many new frameworks with more features. Some of them are Ionic Framework, Xamarin, Unity, Titanium. Most of the Hybrid apps are powered by Cordova backbone. Out of all these frameworks, Ionic Framework is said to be the best one which provides many components and plugins. If you are a c# Developer then you may go with Xamarin or Unity. And Unity is must if you are looking at developing games.

Get your Virtual Reality Mobile Application

Designing Hybrid Mobile Apps

The more the app is user-friendly with good user experience, The more that app will be a successful one. Though there are many ready designs are available. It is better to go with a unique design which is impressive. Ionic Framework is providing many UI components which made the designing bit easier. The more we make easy to use the app and understand the concept of the app, The more chance for the success we will get.

Don’t go with Hybrid Mobile App Development

Why Hybrid Mobile Apps

This might be the first question while reading this article. Though there are native platforms available for developing Android and iOS applications. There must be a special reason to choose Hybrid mobile platform. If you are looking to make the application on a different platform in short period of time. And also in low budget, then the Hybrid platform is the best one.

There are many constraints to be considered before going with Hybrid Mobile apps platform. Feel free to contact us for a free consultation on developing with Hybrid mobile apps.

Cross Platform Mobile App Development – Things To Know

Choosing the right Niche

Focusing on particular Niche will increase the chance of getting the app success. The more the app solves a particular problem, The more the app will get succeed. Most of the successful apps are concentrating on a very specific niche and Solving a specific problem. Also making the app more interactive and entertainment will get more user engagement.

Making the Revenue Model

The revenue model and the amount of revenue of an application decides the success of an app. The more revenue it gets, The more success the app is. Concentrating more on attracting a huge range of customers automatically increase revenue. More customers =  More revenue. With the ads in free app version, or launching business driving model with app surely will help for more revenue.

Shameless marketing is more important. After making the app with perfect UI and good revenue model, Marketing has to be done in proper way. The amount and time used to develop the application, Double it in marketing for a good reach.

Feel free to share your reviews over comments and reach us for any clarifications or consultations.

Double Your Profit With Mobile App for Blog

The post Secrets of the Successful Hybrid Mobile Apps appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Cross Platform Mobile App Development – Things To Know
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Cross Platform Mobile App Development – Things To Know appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
The scope of Cross Platform Mobile App Development has been increasing. And the range of developing multi-platform applications is also increasing. Cross platform mobile app development is not something web app. Creating web app is different and Creating Hybrid or cross platform mobile app development. HTML5 app development is basically mentioned as a Web app. And using some frameworks to develop the mobile app is different. Before proceeding with Cross platform Mobile app, Make sure you are aware of these things.

What is Cross Platform Mobile App Development

A cross platform mobile app development is the development of Mobile apps. These apps can be deployed on multiple platforms like Android, iOS, Windows, Blackberry etc.,  The development of mobile application over multiple platforms may cost more time and money.  Whereas in Cross Platform Mobile App Development, This can be done at the cost and time of developing a single platform app. HTML5 apps are web apps, and if the application is developed using any frameworks which can be mentioned as cross platform mobile app.

Don’t go with Hybrid Mobile App Development

What all the frameworks available for Cross Platform Mobile App Development

When it comes to choosing the right technology and frameworks for developing cross platform mobile apps. It is difficult to choose the right one. After going through certain research process we came up with some frameworks which can be used.

Ionic Framework

Ionic Framework is one of the popular Cross-platform app development frameworks. This framework has been coming up with regular updates with lots of bug fixes. The recent launch iPhone X screen can be supported by this framework.  This app is completely based on Angular which is well-grooming technology and it is powered by cordova.

Xamarin

As like Ionic Framework, Xamarin is one of the best frameworks for developing the cross-platform mobile app. Xamarin is purely based on C# Microsoft technology. If you are looking to move to enterprise edition app then you may go with Xamarin rather than going with Open source technology.

Unity

Unity Frameworks are for Game Developers. If your application is going to use many animated modules. If you are planning to develop a game on multiple platforms, Then unity is the best choice.

Double Your Profit With Mobile App for Blog

Pros and Cons of Cross-Platform Mobile App Development

  • The biggest advance of going to Cross-Platform Mobile App Development is cost and time. If you are looking to develop the multiplatform app in less time or cost then it is the best choice
  • In same time if you are looking to the develop mobile app which uses many native functions then it is not recommended
  • To develop a standard Multi-platform mobile app, experienced developer is needed on cross-platform
  • Using frameworks to make the mobile app to make the app stronger
  • Native apps only suit if you are looking to develop a high-performance mobile app with many native functions with a high cost.

If you are looking to develop cross-platform mobile app utilize our free consultation. Reach us info@hasotech.com or contact us.

Five Things That You Never Expect On Mobile App Development

The post Cross Platform Mobile App Development – Things To Know appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Don’t go with Hybrid Mobile App Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Don’t go with Hybrid Mobile App Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Why You Should Not Go To Hybrid Mobile App Development

Hybrid Mobile App Development is one of the best ways to develop mobile apps on different platforms. If you are looking to develop mobile apps on Android, iOS, and other platforms. Then Hybrid Mobile App Development is the best. Of course, Hybrid Mobile App Development reduces cost and time of Development. But, There are some factors to consider before going into development. Before selecting the Hybrid app Development platform. Make sure your app doesn’t fall into these categories.

Are you still looking for what is Hybrid Mobile App development? Check this link for more.

Build Intelligent Mobile App

Check Lists Before going with Hybrid Mobile App Development

Before selecting Hybrid App Development platform, Make sure your app doesn’t fall under below lists.

  • Are you expecting very high performance?
  • Is your app using many native functions?
  • Does your target users know your platform?
  • Is your competitor App is using the Native platform?
  • Is the app is very complex one?
  • Any animated or graphics to be integrated with App?

If the answer is YES for all the questions, Then it is better to move with Native Mobile App Development than Hybrid.

Who Should use Hybrid Mobile App Development

Most of the above-mentioned features are important for a Mobile app development. However, if your answer is YES for those questions but still thinking to go with Hybrid App Development. Or looking for the answer for Who should use Hybrid Mobile App Development, Here it is.

If you are looking to develop the App in less time and cost. Then Hybrid Mobile App Development is the best. It doesn’t mean that You will get a less performance, non-native functions using application. Hybrid App development needs an experienced developer to make effective App.

What’s crazy on Mobile App Development

One can able to develop high performance, using native functions, implementing complex functionalities Hybrid Mobile app. If he is well experienced and knows how to use the Hybrid platform in the best way.  If you have confidence on your developer to get you delivered Hybrid Mobile App with all features, You can still proceed with it.

Which Framework for Hybrid Mobile App Development

There are many frameworks available for Hybrid Mobile App Development. And we suggest you go with Ionic Framework which is good. Ionic Framework uses Angular 4 which is being used on Developing PWA Applications. Before developing the application, Make sure you get your hands dirty with Ionic Framework. If you are looking for any help on Ionic Framework, Feel free to comment below.

Check more about Ionic Framework

Conclusion

Going to Hybrid Mobile App Development, Doesn’t mean that you will get the worst application. If you choose a right framework and a Good developer. Then you can able to get a Good standard Application. Hybrid Mobile Application reduces your cost and Time. Consider your motive of developing the application and choose the right one.

Feel free to share your thoughts with us over Comments or Mailbox: info@hasotech.com

Five Things That You Never Expect On Mobile App Development

The post Don’t go with Hybrid Mobile App Development appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Get your Augmented Reality App for Android and iOS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Get your Augmented Reality App for Android and iOS appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Get your Augmented Reality App for Android and iOS

Augmented Reality is one of the emerging technology. Which is being used in various domains like games, health etc., After the release of Pokemon Go game, the scope of Augmented reality app for Android and iOS has become very large. This automatically made many organizations to use Augmented Reality app for Android and iOS. Though AR got a good response still there are many conflictions with AR applications. The technology used in Augmented reality app is typical. There are many libraries and plugins are available. But choosing the right one for the Augmented reality app for Android and iOS is tough.

Very easy to Develop a Mobile App

Augmented Reality App for Android and iOS

If you are looking to develop Augmented Reality app for Android and iOS. Then the best way is to make Hybrid Mobile App. By which one can able to deploy single source on both Android and iOS. Check more about Hybrid Mobile Application Development

One of the best Augmented Reality library for Hybrid Mobile app is Wikitude. Wikitude provides both Native and Hybrid Mobile App libraries.  With Wikitude, One can able to develop Augmented Reality App for Android and iOS. If you are looking for a complete native solution, You may use the same Wikitude. Or simply go with Unity framework which actually uses c# and javascript to develop AR Applications.

Another best plugin for developing AR application is Vuforia. Which provides best tools for developing AR apps. Using Vuforia with unity helps to develop a good AR Application.

Get your Virtual Reality Mobile Application

AR kit is also available in React Native. Which made very easier to develop iOS AR applications. But it doesn’t have any proper support and not in Android. If you are looking to develop AR app only on iOS. and looking in short time then you may go with this technology.

The best AR development libraries are Wikitude and Vuforia. If you are looking to develop an AR Mobile App, reach us over info@hasotech.com. We will reach you shortly else comment your views. We will help to provide a solution.

How to get Free Magento 2 Mobile App
